mapper.update: update good_comments set score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, verify_user_id = #{verifyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, verify_type = #{verifyType,jdbcType=BIT}, verified_at = #{verifiedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, good_id = #{goodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, score, customer_id, verify_user_id, verify_type, verified_at, order_id, status, good_id, created_at, updated_at, content from good_comments where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
